mapper.select: select outdoor_info_num, location_specific, outdoor_detail_info, location_city_num, outdoor_detail_memo from outdoor_info
mapper.insert: insert into outdoor_info (outdoor_info_num, location_city_num, location_specific, outdoor_detail_info, outdoor_detail_memo) VALUES (outdoor_seq.nextval, (select location_city_num from location_city where city_name = #{city_name}), #{location_specific}, #{outdoor_detail_info}, #{outdoor_detail_memo})
